Articles.Content: Well hold onto those pants yall. MOARdV will be joining the team as plugin developer. He has alwreadymade something spiffy that we are looking to alpha test in the next release. Once completed and fleshed out furthur it wil really be a game changer I think.

Well hold onto those pants yall. MOARdV will be joining the team as plugin developer. He has alwreadymade something spiffy that we are looking to alpha test in the next release. Once completed and fleshed out furthur it wil really be a game changer I think.

Those levels of teasing should be illegal

Those levels of teasing should be illegal

I agree.

10char

Those levels of teasing should be illegal

I could tease further with a screen shot... But CBBP may not appreciate me stealing thunder like that.

I could tease further with a screen shot... But CBBP may not appreciate me stealing thunder like that.

You teasing about teasing is even worse of a tease than CBBP tease.
KerbalStuff.... My preference... Just happy to see this coming back......
Congrats on joining the team MOARdv. Looking forward to just what that game changing plugin will do.

Congrats on joining the team MOARdv. Looking forward to just what that game changing plugin will do.

It'll change the game, of course.
Basically. I installed something into my more recent parts in hopes that someone with programming ability would take use of it. And MOARdV has done that.

Basically. I installed something into my more recent parts in hopes that someone with programming ability would take use of it. And MOARdV has done that.

So what is it?!?!?!
This is how I feel

Well hold onto those pants yall. MOARdV will be joining the team as plugin developer. He has alwreadymade something spiffy that we are looking to alpha test in the next release. Once completed and fleshed out furthur it wil really be a game changer I think.

An just when I found my jaw... dammit, I lost it again.

I stumbled upon the secret by chance XD

I'm toying around with it right now, but I won't spoiler it to the others. It's really good, however.

I vote kerbalstuff for the main download, and github for development versions. Others have used github to great effect with version control.

Related question though, do people actually use kerbalstuff to browse for content/mods/plugins? I know I almost exclusively use the forums for that and only go to kerbalstuff when the download link goes there.

I vote kerbalstuff for the main download, and github for development versions. Others have used github to great effect with version control.

Related question though, do people actually use kerbalstuff to browse for content/mods/plugins? I know I almost exclusively use the forums for that and only go to kerbalstuff when the download link goes there.

I do, there have been occasions - rare, but it does happen - that a mod will show up on KerbalStuff out of nowhere, and sometimes several days go by before the developer decides/gets around to putting it on the forum or Curse.

I stumbled upon the secret by chance XD

I'm toying around with it right now, but I won't spoiler it to the others. It's really good, however.

Hey hey hey thats not fair!!
I cant wait! loved the old KOSMOS!
this will be awesome. Long live KOSMOS!
whoa. ancient kosmos right there.
I still haven't seen panels as good as the old Almaz panels. Those were, and still are, my favorites.
Will we get a NERVA based on the Russian NERVA studies back in the '60s, '70s, and '80s?

Will we get a NERVA based on the Russian NERVA studies back in the '60s, '70s, and '80s?

This was posted on the old thread...

look at those gimbals engine... <3
That's like talking about the Russian Saturn V project and meaning N-1. NERVA is the name of a US NTR project; there have been other NTR projects (like RD-0410).

the NTR that is being given is in pretty much in no way Russian or like the RD-0410. it merely ha a similar name. in the picture posted above the old RD-0440 (The Yellow one) is a good bit similar to the RD-0410. The new one is closer to the P&W LANTR NTR which is based on the Russians awesome RD-0410.... naturally there are hybrid
